page.title: 15Local History of Dymchurch
page.content: Martello Tower 24 is in the middle of Dymchurch .It was built during the war against Napoleon.On top of the tower is a 24 pdr cannon.Martello 24 was built to protect one of the sluices which control the water level on Rom- ney Marsh.It had 9568 visitors last year. New Hall was built in 1574.It was the meeting place for the Lords of the Level and the court-room for Romney Marsh until 1953.There is a tiny cell, once used as a prison.Among a collec- tion of bygones is a ship's figure- head of Gog which is featured in "Dr Syn Returns" by Russell Thorndike. The parish church is Norman.It was en- larged in 1821 because the population increased.The gallery was put up and the tower replaced.There are about 12 weddings in the church a year.There are 3 bells but one is cracked.
